root_causes: Entry condition not enforced: Expected validation to run only when GetNum('S7_1') > 0 but generated script applies checks unconditionally.
Selection gating missing: the temporary SELECT/SEL IF does not restrict validation to cases where S7_1 > 0.
instructions: Enforce the entry condition GetNum('S7_1') > 0 when performing validation/listing. For example, only run the range checks and the B4g_chk cross-variable rule for records where S7_1 > 0 (e.g., wrap checks in IF (not miss(S7_1) and S7_1 > 0) ... or include (S7_1 > 0) in the SEL IF expression).
Modify the temporary SEL IF so it includes the entry condition: sel if (S7_1 > 0) and (miss(B4g_1) or ~range(B4g_1,0,999) or miss(B4g_2) or ~range(B4g_2,0,999) or (B4g_chk<>1)).
Ensure the cross-variable checks remain the same (B4g_2 > S7_1 or B4g_2 < B4dx1_98) but only evaluated when S7_1 > 0 per the entry condition.

root_causes: Entry condition not enforced: Expected validation to apply only when GetNum('S7_1') > 0 AND GetNum('B4dx1_98') > 0, but generated script does not enforce S7_1 > 0.
Selection gating missing: the temporary SEL IF does not restrict validation to records meeting both entry conditions.
instructions: Enforce the combined entry condition GetNum('S7_1') > 0 and GetNum('B4dx1_98') > 0 before applying the B4j validations. Only evaluate range checks and the cross-variable rule when both S7_1>0 and B4dx1_98>0.

Include the entry condition in the SEL IF used for listing invalid cases, e.g.: sel if (S7_1 > 0 and B4dx1_98 > 0) and (miss(B4j_1) or ~range(B4j_1,0,999) or miss(B4j_2) or ~range(B4j_2,0,999) or (B4j_chk<>1)).
Keep the existing cross-variable check (flag when B4j_2 > B4dx1_98) but ensure it only runs under the entry condition.
